column3: “I still like this stain better than most. Tastes good, you get nice and high and it doesn't give you couch lock , so you can get your stuff done during the day.”
“Excellent strain for patients with ADHD. Very helpful with anxiety and really helps calm the mind”

“I tried this strain for the first time a few days ago. I have to say if you can get past the first smell you will be ok. This is 100% a creeper. I took two hits and was like ummmm ok where is the high? Then a few moments later BAM!!! it me like a tone of bricks! I had never been so high in my life! I found myself completely focused and my whole body felt as if it were vibrating. I have only tried a few others ; OG, P...”

“Strain: Permafrost OG
Head High: 10
Body High: 3
Tips: Take when in a good mood or around a great atmosphere. If you take it while sketchy, you'll regret it. High lasts all day, even with naps.”

“Perma Frost has become my all-time favorite strain. I have had some amazing spiritual epiphanies while under her gentle influence, and I even embarked on a 10 mile walk through the brisk night air. It was a great experience, I felt very exhilarated and alive. I find the mindset it puts me in to be very similar to the most positive aspects of a psychedelic trip! This strain also provides a buzzy body high that is extr...”

“Permafrost was a great strain. It was very energizing and made EVERYTHING hilarious! It also shed a whole new light on a lot of experiences. This is a very social strain, so its best to smoke with your buddies. The smell is incredible, just like pine.”

“My absolute favorite strain! Extremely uplifting, great for anxiety! 

I'm prone to paranoia and sensitive to THC in general, so I always tread carefully when it comes to sativa-dominant hybrids. However, Permafrost has consistently provided a wonderful clear-headed and euphoric high, without any paranoia whatsoever. The body high is subtle and I personally did not feel the pain relief was anything significant, but t...”

“I grew this strain from clone in a 100% perlite hempy bucket.  The plant was a gem, never a lick of problems and grew to harvest in about 68 days (Flower).   It was smallish when I started so I ended up with about 2oz dry.     

This was slow dried then jar cured to 58% relative humidity and sealed.  My test smoke was three bong hits from the product when it reached 58%RH so early if no cure in jars at this time ex...”

“Permafrost is a true gift for sufferers of anxiety and depression. It works wonders in the morning as an engine starter and replaced my red bull/coffee.  Permafrost has a nutty taste that is reminiscent of white widow, though no where near as strong, mixed with a mint like flavor. The instant effects have driven away several panic attacks and for that reason alone I always try to keep some permafrost on hand.”
“Damn my asshole tingles”
“Great Taste, one of my favorites.”
“almost as good as Elvis. Very uplifting and fun. energized and helps with muscles. love it”
“I have very mixed feelings about this strain. In low doses its exactly the pick me up in the morning you are looking for, but when you consume heavily I end up very paranoid and anxious.”

“One of my favorites, me and my friend got super chopped of this strain and somehow convinced our German Teacher to leave the whole room to us before she left. I'm sorry for getting off topic, so I'll talk about the high now. In a nutshell I'd say the greatest effect it had on me is it made me just be in a very good mood and very talkative in a calm way, as well as a good one to get the munchies with because it seemed...”

“I've smoked several different phenotypes of permafrost..   Right now I have the best batch i have ever gotten from my MMJ dealer, perfectly cured and sparkly smelly and yummy all the way around, so i thought I would write a review real quick.  First of all the smell of this stuff is very sweet and piney, very nice.  The smell after smoked is truly unique and seriously fkin pungent and dank.  The high is a creeper, ve...”

“I really like this strain. I just randomly came across it and was pleasantly surprised that this strain is cheap (where I bought it anyways), tastes great, and works wonders for my anxiety. I wasn’t expecting the strain to curve it at all but it did so that’s always a big plus for me in strains. Big buds with beautiful crystals. Makes me happy, euphoric, relaxed, and focused. I’m able to enjoy tv watching, creative w...”

“Smooth smoke, nice finish. Very creative and laid back buzz. All around great herb. From Fweedom Collective
50%Indica:
50%Sativa:
15.04%THC:
0.01%CBD:
Perma Frost”
“IT'S NAMED PERMAFROST FOR A REASON. Very Stoney.”
“Tastes great, very crystally. Would reccomend!”

“I really like this strain. I just randomly came across it and was pleasantly surprised that this strain is cheap (where I bought it anyways), tastes great, and works wonders for my anxiety. I wasn’t expecting the strain to curve it at all but it did so that’s always a big plus for me in strains. Big buds with beautiful crystals. Makes me happy, euphoric, relaxed, and focused. I’m able to enjoy tv watching, creative w...”
“I'm fairly new to the scene but this has by far been my favorite. Nice mental uplift, very relaxed and happy and helps focus some of my ADD.  Really nice muscle and body relax tingle. My fave”

“I have acute gastritis and the worst part about most days is the nausea and pain. Permafrost takes all the nausea and the pain away associated with my medical condition. This is close to the top of the list of best buds so far.”

“Good for headache, migraine, insomnia, depression, stress, appetite, nausea, pms, neuropathic pain, body pain. Offers a wonderful feeling of euphoria
Helps with relaxation and sleeping.”

“I've smoked several different phenotypes of permafrost..   Right now I have the best batch i have ever gotten from my MMJ dealer, perfectly cured and sparkly smelly and yummy all the way around, so i thought I would write a review real quick.  First of all the smell of this stuff is very sweet and piney, very nice.  The smell after smoked is truly unique and seriously fkin pungent and dank.  The high is a creeper, ve...”
“ok”

“Smooth smoke, nice finish. Very creative and laid back buzz. All around great herb. From Fweedom Collective
50%Indica:
50%Sativa:
15.04%THC:
0.01%CBD:
Perma Frost”
“Extremely relaxing for me. I suffer from depression, social anxiety and psoriatic arthritis & a few toots of this help me with all 3. Very smooth too.”

“1st off a couple of things, I live in Sacramento and this strain is huge here in nor cal and after speaking to MANY MASTER GROWERS of this exact strain, the TRUE GENETICS are actually (White Widow x Northern Lights). Its considered to be very close to a 50/50 hybrid. I've bought this strain from 6 different dispensaries here in Sac and I even bought an 8th of it while visiting my Dad in Washington and all 7 times the...”

“One of my favorite all time, all around strains. Potent midday to late afternoon strain. Slightly heavy for morning but still doable if need be. The perfect hybrid of all time! Slightly heavier than White Widow in terms of effects. Taste much like WW also. If i had to pick only one strain for all the time, this would be it. That's how much I like this strain. Only downside is the taste is not fruity (although I still...”

“This is a great strain, I mean fucking great. It definitely creeps up on you..and when you peak, the floaty head high along with the subtle stoney couch lock body high is just perfect. It doesn't make you tired but it doesn't get you too creative, uplifted either. It's a perfect blend of both worlds with the sativa rush slightly overpowering its chilled indica sister. I'm keyed off this right now as I write this, it'...”

“It devastates my throat but this is definitely my favorite strain. I have ibs, acid reflux diseasd, adhd, biplar disorder and an anxiety disorder and as early as just starting for feel it's effects, my mood is improved, my stomach doesn't hurt at all and it just whips away my anxiety and gives me motivation and focus too. It makes me WANT to do my tasks for the day. It treats all of my conditions effectively enough t...”
“Extremely social, extremely talkative and pretty focused when using this. And a lovely sweet orange flavor. Dry eyes, but who cares.”
“Permafrost is my second fav behind Death Star. Almost the same, but the DS seams more potent.”

“i’m bipolar. concentration, mania, depression, anxiety and chronic insomnia are all painful symptoms. i smoke medicinally so i only need two average hits for it to take effect. obviously, the sativa is almost instantaneously induced, gets real heady, like i need to do something, anything... energy was present. in about 20 minutes the underlying indica emerges hitting me in waves and as i watch a movie, i must fight t...”

“Oh permafrost how I love thee... let me count the ways. 
True to form permafrost will hype you up, put your mind in a blender, shake you around a bit, then gently lay you down. 
This strain also provides some nice visual effects.”

“Excellent for reading. I'm working my way through Marx's Capital and this strain is especially good at helping me focus and retain what I read. I seem to appreciate prose more when I'm stoned. Not much of a body high unfortunately, but that can be good in a way.”

“Super high-energy and creative strain. I got this at 7 PM after smoking another strain all day that had me burnt out and struggling to stay awake. Had some of this, fifteen minutes later I'm wide awake. I work out, make baked apples, make spaghetti, and do the dishes. 

Taste is VERY strong. Like a punch to the tongue. It's not a horrible taste but it's not a super pleasant one either. Like tree sap and firewood. Ble...”
“lovely, super happy stone.”

“Want to be relaxed, yet productive at a strolling pace? Choose this. 
Want to go to bed after your stroll? Choose this. You don't feel zonked, but you can sleep if you choose to. Quite peacefully I might add.”
“If you have any mental disorders and are looking for some relief, this is for you..”

“Tastes like pine, reminds me of a hike through the woods in the PacNW.

Feels peaceful, meditative, focused, blissful.

Pain relief is centered on the neck / shoulders.

Vision is colorful, golden hour becomes even more golden...might waste film on some great shots.”
“good head high headache and cotton mouth. stoney stuff nonetheless!  harsh taste but gets your eyes red fast.”

“Oh permafrost how I love thee... let me count the ways. 
True to form permafrost will hype you up, put your mind in a blender, shake you around a bit, then gently lay you down. 
This strain also provides some nice visual effects.”

Taste is VERY strong. Like a punch to the tongue. It's not a horrible taste but it's not a super pleasant one either. Like tree sap and firewood. Ble...”
“lovely, super happy stone.”
“Great for socializing, day-use. Relieves any tension or pain in joints. Productive and talkative, yet relaxing high.”
“Extremely social, extremely talkative and pretty focused when using this. And a lovely sweet orange flavor. Dry eyes, but who cares.”

“Excellent for reading. I'm working my way through Marx's Capital and this strain is especially good at helping me focus and retain what I read. I seem to appreciate prose more when I'm stoned. Not much of a body high unfortunately, but that can be good in a way.”

Want to go to bed after your stroll? Choose this. You don't feel zonked, but you can sleep if you choose to. Quite peacefully I might add.”
“Extremely social, extremely talkative and pretty focused when using this. And a lovely sweet orange flavor. Dry eyes, but who cares.”
“Light enough for day, but a bit too foggy for me.  Not as clean head-wise as say Green Crack.”
“Relaxing and deep indica body high with a rather rare pinch of sativa cerebral kick.   It ends up being a usable" couch lock that works great for reading
column4: studying or getting some work done.    Only negative comment is that it packs a mild dizzy feeling that can turn in a subtle feeling of a minimalistic vertigo.”"

column3: “This is a great strain, I mean fucking great. It definitely creeps up on you..and when you peak, the floaty head high along with the subtle stoney couch lock body high is just perfect. It doesn't make you tired but it doesn't get you too creative, uplifted either. It's a perfect blend of both worlds with the sativa rush slightly overpowering its chilled indica sister. I'm keyed off this right now as I write this, it'...”

“This strain has a lightly sweet and minty smell. The flower has a medium amount of resin on it. The flowers density was medium and the light green color provided a nice compromise to the darkness of the hairs. 
Perfect for its ability to inspire and provide an increased sense of focus, Permafrost provides a high that could be described as euphoric, happy, focused, and driven. One interesting thing is that Permafrost ...”
“I like this strain. It works OK for pain but very well for depression and anxiety. It comes on slow and doesn't take long to hit. I felt very relaxed and I always sleep well when I smoke this.”

“This is a long-time favorite strain.  Very uplifting, and happy, stress melts away as euphoria sets in.  Great day-time, social high, awesome for social gamers.  The body high is strong, joints feel warm, and are warmer to the touch relaxing any joint pain, or stiffness.  Muscles relax, and you just live happily.  This strain, without fail, also is great as an aphrodisiac.  I have found it to surprisingly do better a...”
“A very smooth, relaxing high.  Very great with friends and an outdoor environment.  This strand inspires a uniquely tranquil and fun mood.  A new favorite.”

“I only smoke hybrids and indicas, as sativas usually make me anxious. However, I quite like this. I have ADD, so this strain is especially helpful to me. I have written essays while high on this stuff. It helps me focus while at the same time calming my body.”

“I really like this strain a lot so far! It can bring you out of the doldrums very swiftly. I also think it's tasty and the clear head high is very refreshing. I get definite euphoria and a general sense of peace from this. It's not a jolt like a normal sativa, this is definitely a slow and steady wins the race type of high. I'd recommend it highly!”

“Very tasty strain with a catch: In small doses it's nice and heady kinda like Trainwreck, but in larger doses (Bong, blunt, etc) it'll put your ass straight to sleep. So if you're looking for a great night time strain look no further, but be careful otherwise :)”

“I'm over 40 I just remember that we used to have brown waiting green weed and then somebody said the word hydroponic and the next thing I knew is I had permafrost and I remember it and it was 23 +years ago and it's was around after I gave up smoking after I had bills and kids. Still got bills.........kids grown both college aged. It will creep  on you body after head first no punching in my face just comes over you a...”
“Very melo. Smooth, can be weak sometimes. Very good day weed, pain relief, but still fully functional. Recently used to relieve a migraine headache, worked perfectly.”
“I like this strain. It works OK for pain but very well for depression and anxiety. It comes on slow and doesn't take long to hit. I felt very relaxed and I always sleep well when I smoke this.”

“This is a long-time favorite strain.  Very uplifting, and happy, stress melts away as euphoria sets in.  Great day-time, social high, awesome for social gamers.  The body high is strong, joints feel warm, and are warmer to the touch relaxing any joint pain, or stiffness.  Muscles relax, and you just live happily.  This strain, without fail, also is great as an aphrodisiac.  I have found it to surprisingly do better a...”

“A nice, smooth rip from a foot long Gandalf pipe. The last time I tasted it I remember it being mintier, but there was a nice, strong aftertaste to it this time. It's a really quality hybrid, that is leaning on the sativa side with the first couple of hits. Rushes straight to the head, but after 2 or 3 bowls you can feel the indica taking over. Permafrost is always a quality smoke.”
“If you look at Permafrost under a magnifying glass for more than three seconds, then you'll want to buy some...excellent strain for strong yet functional daytime use.”
“Temp control on the cool side makes this strain very happy.”

“I was actually disappointed when I got home, this was listed and sold to me as an indica dominant hybrid. I was purposely getting one sativa one indica. Instead I have two sativa's and am not going to have any sleep aid until I get more money.

I definitely notice a pine or minty aroma, the buzzkit lasts me about 3.5 hours”
“I like this strain. It works OK for pain but very well for depression and anxiety. It comes on slow and doesn't take long to hit. I felt very relaxed and I always sleep well when I smoke this.”

“LONG-time favorite for the happy effect. plus just general good mood it presents. Great taste and burns well, if a little too fast.
My only complaint is it can be a little harsh" at times and does make my nose run more than others.”"

“This is, for sure a forever-favorite strain. It’s put me in the best mood I’ve ever been in along time. I was having an off day at work and in a bad mood too and after smoking permafrost I forgot why I was mad today at work. I smoked around 1215 am and it made me have a relaxing body high with enough energy to stay motivated. Not sluggish at all. I’ve been dealing with depression and anxiety and right now, I feel lik...”

“I really like this strain a lot so far! It can bring you out of the doldrums very swiftly. I also think it's tasty and the clear head high is very refreshing. I get definite euphoria and a general sense of peace from this. It's not a jolt like a normal sativa, this is definitely a slow and steady wins the race type of high. I'd recommend it highly!”

“Didn't get the affect I was looking for, says it's supposed to be a happy high and really relaxing. But I find my self feeling down and way to relaxed(couch locked), almost a depressed feeling in my opinion, not a happy high, but a very relaxed and slow high. Also very rough hits, kinda burns the back of my throat.”
“Hands down my favorite strain. I use it in flower and sugar wax. You must really give this one a try! But be warned this one is a mind twister. If you want a relaxing smoke, give it a try.”

“got this from  a local dispense that was sadly shut down. this is called dark black angel...was pretty damn good i must say.  grinded pretty good in the picture, getting ready for baking :) also vaped it worked great for my spasms also migraines . this is a good strain.”
“Very melo. Smooth, can be weak sometimes. Very good day weed, pain relief, but still fully functional. Recently used to relieve a migraine headache, worked perfectly.”
“I like this strain. It works OK for pain but very well for depression and anxiety. It comes on slow and doesn't take long to hit. I felt very relaxed and I always sleep well when I smoke this.”

“Some of the frostiest buds I have ever laid eyes on permafrost is a wonderful hybrid with a smooth flavor. The relaxing but uplifting effects make it great for weekend relaxing or after work but before dinner. I highly recommend trying this of you have the chance!”

“It was 6 dollars for a gram, and wanted to see if I could space some of the day with cheaper weed. I am very impressed with this weed.  I prefer Indica's,but I am diggin this Savtiva. Good for beginners or just for people that don't have a lot of money.  Me".

column1: I purchased this from the dispensary in Damascus called "Green Apple N.W."   I might get an ounce in a few days. Oh and yes I am very high right now. :) Chet”"

column3: “This is a long-time favorite strain.  Very uplifting, and happy, stress melts away as euphoria sets in.  Great day-time, social high, awesome for social gamers.  The body high is strong, joints feel warm, and are warmer to the touch relaxing any joint pain, or stiffness.  Muscles relax, and you just live happily.  This strain, without fail, also is great as an aphrodisiac.  I have found it to surprisingly do better a...”

“whoever runs this site and talks about the genetics of a strain are absolutely stupid. everyone from LA to Sac town to Humboldt county knows that this strain is all indica and its white widow crossed with northern lights and in sum cases white widow x northern lights #5”
“Hands down my favorite strain. I use it in flower and sugar wax. You must really give this one a try! But be warned this one is a mind twister. If you want a relaxing smoke, give it a try.”
“This strain is amazing for ADD/ADHD you can definitely get into a conversation or project with this one.”

“Some of the frostiest buds I have ever laid eyes on permafrost is a wonderful hybrid with a smooth flavor. The relaxing but uplifting effects make it great for weekend relaxing or after work but before dinner. I highly recommend trying this of you have the chance!”

column3: “Huge big buds!  Smooth smoke with no rough edges.  Initially a bit of earthy taste in the mouth that seems to disappear pretty quickly.  Really a pleasant high.  A big calming for both mind and body with some small tingles and sensitivity increases.  Really just a feeling of being normally in control in a very relaxed environment; like going on vacation.”

“I really like this strain a lot so far! It can bring you out of the doldrums very swiftly. I also think it's tasty and the clear head high is very refreshing. I get definite euphoria and a general sense of peace from this. It's not a jolt like a normal sativa, this is definitely a slow and steady wins the race type of high. I'd recommend it highly!”
“I like this strain. It works OK for pain but very well for depression and anxiety. It comes on slow and doesn't take long to hit. I felt very relaxed and I always sleep well when I smoke this.”

“These buds were covered in more crystals than I've seen in a long time. The combo of white widow and trainwreck gave me an expectation of sativa dominant effects however I felt the effects were more indica dominant relaxing and relieving stomach pains. The body buzz from this strain is immensely strong.”

“This Permafrost oil was incredible! At 90.6% THC it was an amazing and clean sativa high! My senses felt at peak, but no anxiety or paranoia whatsoever! Truly amazing stuff, and really smooth to hit, even in a small rig with no water.”

“Permafrost is true to its name with frosty crystals covering solid buds which some larger ones resemble a well trimmed Christmas tree covered in tinsel. This piney forest scented flower has a strong potency with rich flavor.  The aromas bring strong resemblance to pine sap and dew covered forest floor.  Earthy and woody notes play as a good bud for a gentleman to enjoy.”

“If I ever grow, this is the strain that I would choose. When it says it can help with ADD, it actually can, I can zone in and focus without questioning it. Great to do chores around the house but at the same time, if you need to relax the part indica lets your body chill out and feel great. Great taste too! I love grinding it up and smelling that fresh pine. Going on a hike would be awesome with this strain! Find a q...”

“This is, for sure a forever-favorite strain. It’s put me in the best mood I’ve ever been in along time. I was having an off day at work and in a bad mood too and after smoking permafrost I forgot why I was mad today at work. I smoked around 1215 am and it made me have a relaxing body high with enough energy to stay motivated. Not sluggish at all. I’ve been dealing with depression and anxiety and right now, I feel lik...”

“As a bud tender in WA, I get a LOT of samples from Rec growers. This strain was grown by Dawg Star Cannabis and I was really glad I chose it. I suffer from ADHD and was pleased to find this strain was a popular choice for treating my condition. Vaped it with my Magic Flight Launch Box and the effects did creep up. A bit of cloudiness at first in the head and then mellowing up to a clear headed high focus. I can see n...”
“Very melo. Smooth, can be weak sometimes. Very good day weed, pain relief, but still fully functional. Recently used to relieve a migraine headache, worked perfectly.”
“Hands down my favorite strain. I use it in flower and sugar wax. You must really give this one a try! But be warned this one is a mind twister. If you want a relaxing smoke, give it a try.”
“This strain is amazing for ADD/ADHD you can definitely get into a conversation or project with this one.”
“no more anxiety, good high. Great smelling bud. I found I could still do my daily activities without any kind off couch lock. And at bedtime I went to bed and actually slept. Great strain”
“Hands down my favorite strain. I use it in flower and sugar wax. You must really give this one a try! But be warned this one is a mind twister. If you want a relaxing smoke, give it a try.”

I get definite euphoria and a general sense of peace from this. It's not a jolt like a normal sativa, this is definitely a slow and steady wins the race type of high. I'd recommend it highly!”
“Very melo. Smooth, can be weak sometimes. Very good day weed, pain relief, but still fully functional. Recently used to relieve a migraine headache, worked perfectly.”
“This helped me relax and get some much needed rest.  I have a fairly low tolerance to meds so it doesn't take a whole lot for me.  Two puffs and I wait...this was a for sure two puff med for me.”
“I like this strain. It works OK for pain but very well for depression and anxiety. It comes on slow and doesn't take long to hit. I felt very relaxed and I always sleep well when I smoke this.”
“Similar to Death Star. Very nice high. Definitely happy and light feeling. And if you’re a creative person this stuff will get your juices flowing!”
“If you look at Permafrost under a magnifying glass for more than three seconds, then you'll want to buy some...excellent strain for strong yet functional daytime use.”

“no more anxiety, good high. Great smelling bud. I found I could still do my daily activities without any kind off couch lock. And at bedtime I went to bed and actually slept. Great strain”
“Temp control on the cool side makes this strain very happy.”
“Really nice body high. Very relaxing and clear minded. Slightly bitter to taste and minty.”
“Smooooth and a good kind of kreaper!”

“I really like this strain a lot so far! It can bring you out of the doldrums very swiftly. I also think it's tasty and the clear head high is very refreshing. I get definite euphoria and a general sense of peace from this. It's not a jolt like a normal sativa, this is definitely a slow and steady wins the race type of high. I'd recommend it highly!”
“Love it works great”

“I picked up 2 grams for Permafrost from different farms to compare them against each other. One was a lower THC then the other so it was not even a close. Not my all time fav but still very tasty. I tried this with an Ice cube in my bong and it left the smoke smooth and cold, which complimented this strain nicely. Really relaxing body feeling and mind for that matter. Was listening to Three Little Birds and loving ev...”
“delicious”

“This is by far my favorite yet.
Very dense, tastes good and has a lot of crystals. 
I would get more of this - I highly recommend it.”
“delicious”

“This is by far my favorite yet.
Very dense, tastes good and has a lot of crystals. 
I would get more of this - I highly recommend it.”
“One my my favorite strains absolutely love it”
“Very frosty, lives up to the name.”

“The high is good very clear headed and positive. Instantly felt happy and had an elevated sense of well being. The strain workes amazing for depression and or if you just need to get stuff done and feel great doing it. Smell isnt what I look for. Really bland grassy woody herbal smell and taste. The high is really what your looking for in this strain. It's worth tasting some mediocre cannabis for a top shelf effect. ...”
“Permafrost she's a fine aromatic glad where the of the gods of old subtle flavor double taste strong and brave with a 24% THC composition and a .01% CBD shit stank Halle Halle shock collar Bala”
“This is very similiar to Og kush. It has a very good body high, yet an exceptional powerful head high.”
“high gave me a slight headache but was overall a good high. tastes of sage and pine.”
“Beautiful strain, light but provides a strong head high. Definitely not a good strain to smoke for anxiety.”
“One of the best for daytime”
“Love this strain...need I say more!”
“great happy relaxed high. really enjoyed the permafrost.  a little taste of mint. very smooth.”
“one of my favs. i always have to pick this strain up for sure. highly recommend.”
“crazy frosty, great taste and an easy toke”
“It's alright”
“TRULY A SUPER MED!!!!!!”
“uppppperrrrr side”

“This strain is great day time smoke. I find that sativa leaning strains often leave me with a slight feeling of anxiety. perma strikes a nice compromise between Sativa & Indica. 

Feeling re-invigorated, but not in a over stimulated jittery way. Excellent strain, surprised I didn't come across it till now.”
“pretty good, definitely slows motor functions”

“One of the most motivational sativa dominant strains out there!  This Permafrost from Lilac City Gardens out of Airway Hights is super light green and loaded with frost.  If you're lucky enough to get your hands on some, it's the perfect thing to get through your to-do" list.  Fresh and piney
“Amazing”
“This strain was smoked out of my bubbler, and was so satisfied with how it helped my ADHD/ ADD. the white widow parent gives it a long lasting full around good high. I really really enjoyed this.”
“Good strain not my all time favorite though. Seemed to me that I might have gotten a mix up because mine was very indica like in effects and citrus like in flavor.”
“This is a solid strain, I'm not usually too fond of non-cbd strains but this delivers a solid energetic buzz. It's smooth and a little earthy/piney, I'm very pleased with it.”
“Definitely one of my favorites. keeps my anxiety at bay. Great for while I'm at work so I can focus better.”
“My first strain. Will strain again. -Blunt Blunt”
“It's aight”
“Very nice Chinese sativa.”

“One of my new favorites. Reminds me somewhat of a very light Indica body buzz with the energy and positivity of a Sativa. This one would most likely be great to get out in nature with, maybe gazing at a waterfall or beach! If you are looking to relax, Perma is your strain.”
“Smooth and rich with an effective, mellow buzz. A good nightcap or something to veg with. Not overpowering.”
“upper”

“good all round strain,a bit of skunk and spice and earthiness.lots of crystals.it was grown by Sparks and was a bit dry and crispy which is not my cup of tea.i gave it 4 stars but it`s closer to 3  1/2.it was ok but could have been a bit fresher and a little more potent.”
“Nice and skunky, good mello high.”
“Possible use being for lack of focus... considerable for project use”
“Increases headaches, and doesn't do much else. I can't focus at all with this strain not good for daytime use if at all.”

“I love this strain! Permafrost is my #1 strain. I’ve tried lots of different strains to treat my Multiple Sclerosis symptoms, but Permafrost helps the best. Permafrost is great for my fatigue, depression, stress and it helps with my pain and muscle spasticity too.”
“This is a solid strain, I'm not usually too fond of non-cbd strains but this delivers a solid energetic buzz. It's smooth and a little earthy/piney, I'm very pleased with it.”
“Very smooth, very frosty, very tasty. Very dense and beautiful nugs that really grab you. Great if you want or need to go do something. Little hunger though :D”
“great happy relaxed high. really enjoyed the permafrost.  a little taste of mint. very smooth.”
“This is my favorite of all time. I have yet to have anything come close in look flavor or potency.”

“I’ve searched high and low for the perfect strain to suit my needs, Permafrost is the one. Most buds make me pace the room with anxiety unless I get couch-lock strains... this one reduces fatigue without heavy sedation or a ramped up heartbeat-

 just a nice smooth, relaxed vibe that lifts you up.”
“This strain is being added to my active bud list. I smoked a joint and became very happy and energized. The flavor is great and the smell is even better.”
“One my my favorite strains absolutely love it”

“Man this strain gave me that “stupid smacked”, feeling. Definitely got caught daydreaming and intense head high but still aware of everything. Definitely a strain to unwind when you have nothing to do. Recommend for those who looking to have a “smacked”, night.”

“This was actually a really satisfying strain. The potency is labeled as rather weak coming in at a whopping 19%. I think it is much higher, but hey, I could just have a weak tolerance, but I like to think, as a budtender, that my tolerance is a little higher than that! Ha-ha. 

But for real, it a great choice. Rogue Raven was the Brand. Super frosty all over great looking weed.”
“i love this strain for every quality it has. i love that i feel medicated, but am still able to go about my day and even get a bit of an energetic buzz from it.”

“Great head high, able to focus on what I need to, which is very useful as an AD/HD treatment. Details seem to pop out, but not in a distracting way. I'm able to notice things, but then go back to what I was working on.

Body high doesn't have heavy couchlock, but doesn't have me floaty like some strains do.

Definitely a creeper, give it some time to set it before you go back for more.”
“great strain for anxiety, great munchies and generally just a great euphoric producing strain 8)”

“Man o man well to start off this was the first strain I ever had besides regos and that was 12 years ago. And I now grow my self and have for a few years in Michigan but I cannot find this strain ANYWHERE I’ve looked on multiple seed banks online but no luck so if someone out there could give me a hand finding Seeds it would be Greatly appreciated..”
“It smells good, tastes like sweet pine and has a great high. I drive to WA just to get it.”
“Covered in crystals, dense nugs, purple hues, great smoke- slightly harsh taste.”
“Good strain not my all time favorite though. Seemed to me that I might have gotten a mix up because mine was very indica like in effects and citrus like in flavor.”
“This strain was smoked out of my bubbler, and was so satisfied with how it helped my ADHD/ ADD. the white widow parent gives it a long lasting full around good high. I really really enjoyed this.”
“Amazing”
“pretty good, definitely slows motor functions”
“uppppperrrrr side”
“Love this strain...need I say more!”
“One of the best for daytime”

“This is by far my favorite yet.
Very dense, tastes good and has a lot of crystals. 
I would get more of this - I highly recommend it.”

“I picked up 2 grams for Permafrost from different farms to compare them against each other. One was a lower THC then the other so it was not even a close. Not my all time fav but still very tasty. I tried this with an Ice cube in my bong and it left the smoke smooth and cold, which complimented this strain nicely. Really relaxing body feeling and mind for that matter. Was listening to Three Little Birds and loving ev...”
“Love it works great”
“I love this strain! Perfect for wake n bake, cleaning the garage, going for a hike, sitting around the campfire, or just before bed.  Awesome good feeling all day kind of strain : )”
“This is definitely a good strain for anxiety. The effects were calming and relaxing. Its taste was  earthy with a sweet finish when vaped at 190℃.”
“My favorite one by far.”

“You get a pretty nice high when you smoke this stuff. It'll definitely satisfy. Though, my mind feels so blank when I'm smoking this stuff that sometimes I just sit there doing nothing and not realize it. Whether that's good or bad is personal preference. I felt good while high on Permafrost, but it was uneventful. Still, it's definitely a solid strain. I got the munchies hard (I had a McDouble I didn't want to finis...”
“light orangish yellow hairs crystally all over spicy ammonia smell to nug finished with a buttery after taste!”

“Very good Sativa high! Made me extremely talkative! This stuff is very dense so you don't need a lot to get the job done ! You start off with a head high then slip into a good body high at the end. Frosty the boat times !”

“Good Strain, will couch lock you for a little while in larger doses but very relaxed. Regular dosage will leave you with some nice visual effects, a nice body calm, all around a good bud if you are going to be out and about or socializing at a party etc. Not the bud to smoke if you are trying to get work done on a computer/behind a desk in my opinion. A good strain but not something I would smoke regularly.”
“Very good strain, heady but relaxing taste is earthy with creamy aftertaste. Frosty with a lighter red look to the bud but very solid nugs.”

“Earthy smell and flavor, this one is a nice body buzz.  Takes you along a relaxing and euphoric ride.  Calming chill engulfs your senses and provides a very nice body high. Head turns a bit to pudding, so good for anxiety but no heavy mathematics.”

“golden tree production
just like every other permafrost...not as flavorful as other brands. nice to get something from golden tree that's seed free.”

“picked up some shatter of this on a whim, but I'm glad I did! 
The high builds as it comes on, no couch lock, and helped a lot with my ADD and anxiety. Provided a small mood boost and euphoria. 
This has quickly become a favorite.”
“This is my go to for some introspection and journaling.”

“Be careful, this strain grows on you. I tried it and liked it and the next thing I knew this strain was like an old friend to come home to after a hard day at work. 

It bulldozes stress, yet does not cause couch lock. I used it before playing drums for a few hours and the strain tickled my creativity. Too much brought on a caffeine type buzz that doesn't work for de-stressing if you are sitting still. So you should ...”

“Love the high..Helps me with my anxiety and pain. Smells Earthlike and fills the room with its aroma...I can stay focused on tasks and function when approach with questions through out the work day.”
“Solid strain. Good head high along with a calming (but not sedating) body high. It's a good choice for day time medication”
“This strain is now one of my all time favorites! It relieves my anxiety, relaxes my body, and generally makes me feel amazing. It creeps up on you but I love that about it 10/10!”
“good for pain”
“Let me tell you something this is the first time I have had this strain and I enjoyed it and will definitely be getting more.”

“Definitely my favorite strain.
It's great for the morning. As someone with mild ADD, this helps me stay present and get things done at a consistent pace. It's also very calming. Not a crazy head high which is what I like about it.”
“Pretty dank. Very well named, because all the buds are super frosty. Creative and uplifting high, but also gives me couch lock. Nice taste/smell.”
“Insane concentrate. I n s a n e.”

“One of the most motivational sativa dominant strains out there!  This Permafrost from Lilac City Gardens out of Airway Hights is super light green and loaded with frost.  If you're lucky enough to get your hands on some, it's the perfect thing to get through your to-do" list.  Fresh and piney

“This strain is great day time smoke. I find that sativa leaning strains often leave me with a slight feeling of anxiety. perma strikes a nice compromise between Sativa & Indica. 

Feeling re-invigorated, but not in a over stimulated jittery way. Excellent strain, surprised I didn't come across it till now.”
“TRULY A SUPER MED!!!!!!”
“It's alright”
“crazy frosty, great taste and an easy toke”
“one of my favs. i always have to pick this strain up for sure. highly recommend.”
“Beautiful strain, light but provides a strong head high. Definitely not a good strain to smoke for anxiety.”
“high gave me a slight headache but was overall a good high. tastes of sage and pine.”
“This is very similiar to Og kush. It has a very good body high, yet an exceptional powerful head high.”
“Very frosty, lives up to the name.”
“delicious”
“Keeps me calm”
“Nice smooth draw and flavor, hits nice and easy. Nice sweet and mellow taste. I found it to be very helpful in relaxing sore and stiff muscles. A very pleasant high, body and mind.”

“The high is good very clear headed and positive. Instantly felt happy and had an elevated sense of well being. The strain workes amazing for depression and or if you just need to get stuff done and feel great doing it. Smell isnt what I look for. Really bland grassy woody herbal smell and taste. The high is really what your looking for in this strain. It's worth tasting some mediocre cannabis for a top shelf effect. ...”
“Permafrost she's a fine aromatic glad where the of the gods of old subtle flavor double taste strong and brave with a 24% THC composition and a .01% CBD shit stank Halle Halle shock collar Bala”
“It has a very clean relaxing come on with level high. Helps a lot with my anxiety from just a couple hits. I'm a 1 or 2 hit a day kinda guy with this strain.”
“Very heady with occasional heightened visual acuity. Relaxing body high without  putting you to sleep. The taste was more generic than I expected, no obvious pine taste like I thought.”
“Really dry mouth”
“Potent and good tasting strain! Perfect for those days where you need to be blazed out of your mind.”

“solid strain for sure, very nice aroma reminds me of belvita blueberry graham crackers! good for pain, this strain will have you dancing to the music in your head as you clean your house or shop for groceries, its not energetic but it doesn't put you down either. not the best for insomnia but will work in a pinch.

if you want a strain that relieves pain an turns up the comedian in your head, give this guy a try”
“This strain leaves you feeling focused and relaxed. It motivates me and brings out my humor side. Good dispensary I picked mine up at.”
“probly one of my favorite strains”

“Purchased from Higher Leaf in Kirkland
Flower: named aptly, Permafrost is ridiculously frosty. Big fluffy nugs, some almost the size of clementines. Smell reminds me of northern lights. Old school aroma. 
Crumble: a bit on the leafy side, didn't grind as well as I thought it would. Perhaps it was a dryer batch. 
Burn: smooth and clean, even. Doesn't want to stay lit long so I suppose it's good for bongs and pipes. No...”
“very medicinal, energetic and potent while fruity and Vibrant”
“well balanced sativa. nice punch to the head that settles into a focused relaxation.”
“I got some of the Permafrost wax and I must say, it's very tasty. Nice relaxed effect but didn't make me sluggish. Just a little dab will do ya ;-)”

“Also, another thing I noticed is that when I work out in the gym, I feel no pain. So I would keep working without knowing I am over exerting myself. It did raise my blood pressure pretty high. So I would definitely be careful of the dose.”
“I smoked this from a bong. It had okay flavor, it wasn't as potent as I was hoping, I didn't notice any feelings of relaxation really.”

“This medication's buds smell pretty sweet but yet when you smoke a few hits in a row it get's to be pretty strong and leave a more strong taste in the back of your throat. It Could be possibly a very good medication for both stress and pain. I think it will work for up to moderate issues in the outlined areas above. It's a great medication.”
“permafrost is AWESOME! Seriously powerful and just what the doctor ordered!”
“Great calm, happy feeling with a slow, creeping high. I could smoke this all day!”

“Definitely a strain for the seasoned smoker! A couple puffs of permafrost will have you feeling great and euphoric in no time. The more of this strain you smoke the heavier the effects will be! Great for going out with friends or when you have some time to be around the outdoors.”
“Very social, relaxed and energetic at the same time.  Good for parties and hanging out.”
“Hit hard. Was the 1st bud we tried after moving to Seattle. Awesome.”

“I've been smoking weed for 3 going on 4 years now (I know that isn't that long) but during those 3-4 years I've smoked A LOTTTTT of different types of weed. This is by far my favorite strain, the smell, the taste, the high, everything about it is great. It has a really relaxing high but I also found I could sit and studying for hours on end while smoking this. Overall, I give this strain a 5/5.”

“I was recommended Permafrost for my depression.  I'm not terribly impressed, tbh, but that may be because it's not the effects i enjoy the most.  It's light, not overwhelming, and i've been using it to help me fall asleep, and save my more potent stuff for later.  No big revelations or deep thoughts, but it is uplifting.”
“Tranquil and relaxing, excellent taste, very smooth. Helps ease pain of sore muscles and such.”
“This is the SMOOTHEST hybrid, everytime I've smoked it! A relaxing high that reduces stress after a long day. Also helps a little with achy muscles.”
“CLEAR, calm, faded, no aches”

“My favorite for when I want an indica type effect (I know it is described as sativa oriented hybrid by most). This is a very strgon hybrid, that will make you pretty mellow. Actually there are 3 different versions. Mine I am speaking of right now is the original, which has purple stalk and stems. The other versions are similar, but not always. I've had weak permafrost before too. If you want a hybrid that is sort of ...”
“for day time use. this a great strain for migraines or pain during the day”
“Great strain. Light and fruity, nice draw and smooth. Not harsh on your lungs at all. Recommend!”
“If its the TRUE Perma From Snohomish Co. then it is worth it.”
“I think it should be called Perma-Grin
column4: Stays with you for a long trip..”

column3: “very relaxing”
“Couldn't hear. That shit be loud son.”
“Work great for insomnia because it creeps up on you. Make you super chillax love it”
“Good to use when you need something to relax, especially when you have asthma. Relaxing, and will help with anxiety, but it does not help with a lot of pain.”
“It was a very relaxing high. Great smell!! It kept my anxiety low and that paranoid" feeling never occurred. I would recommend permafrost for anyone who suffers from being panicky when high.”"
“My first intro to vaping was with Permafrost  wax. Great taste, great for chillaxing!”
“Damn this bud is great. One of my favorite strains now, I don't know what it is but it gets me so high. 10/10 would much recommend”
“Daddy Af”

“Perma frost is a very good strain. The bud has a very frosty appearance because of its large trichome content.  It produces a high that is clear , yet still makes you feel very comfortable. I would suggest this strain to anyone that likes trainwreck or white widow.”
“For a sativa hybrid it has a much more indica effect. Becoming one with the couch and great sleep is what I'd recommend this strain for. Great taste, and good cottonmouth flavor.”
“one of my favorites.”
“very great for pain and stress awesome uplifting strain”
“Spicy, generally tasty overall. Smoked before seeing Purity Ring, definitely good for music.”
“One of the best strains I've ever smoked, recommend to anyone looking to get really high.”

“Picked some of this up because I wanted a strong sativa... Oh I got it. Went on a hike at dusk with some friends after smoking some of this... Let's just say it was a great time. If you can find this give it a shot, I don't think you'll regret it. Not a lightweight strain.”
“Very relaxing, great woody taste.”
“cant foreget hunger after one bowl it will cure all hunger issues”

“Gave a really focused, relaxed high. Right after smoking this, I filled out a bunch of job applications, and had fun doing it. Great focused high that isn't too intense, good for getting things done.”
“Has two of both worlds, half of the time you can get things done and the other half you are totally relaxed and calm in all ways”
“its really easy to grow good high. i just did a cross of the black and the purps from bc bud depot and one of my pheno's looks just like the perma frost”

“I'm not sure I smoked the described herb here. My effects are quite different from what I expected. It's not affecting me like a sativa at all, makes me mellow and lazy. Like I want to grab a big bag of chips or popcorn and watch South Park for a few hours. The nugs were certainly frosty, gorgeous and sparkly... Maybe I should save the rest for xmas eve and snack and relax all evening. But for myself it's not a good ...”

“I enjoy the earthy yet spicy taste of this strain. Quickly relieves my neck pains. A Friend uses it to ez pressure on his eyes. It does get the mind going also and i have had a few inspirational moments under its effects.”
“Ok”

“Seriously frosty nugs that are dense with sugar white crystals. Not many hairs.  Smells  like a mixture of 3 parts fruity citrus more orange based with lemon finish, 2 parts pine, and 1 part mint. Effects.... Begins with a slight buzz permeating from the center of your brain. Shifts to feelings of happiness and a general feeling of AHHHHHH.....  Great relaxation. Was as potent as it looked.”
“nice mellow high with a smooth burning hit. and piney after taste”
“II like this breed always fresh great taste.”
“Vaped fresh from Terrapin Station ... early and sweet flavors ... gradual rise to high so far”
“This stuff is the bomb! An amazing head high and a boost of energy and focus.”
“good, causes dizziness. I'm so high right now my butt cheek is tingly haha”
“LOVED this strain for daytime anxiety. If you can't get your hands on any Jack Herer or Blue Dream, this is the hybrid for you”
“Nice, clean tasting strain. Happy high, where I can still do housework or work from home. High wears off quickly.”

“this strain of permafrost had a very harsh burn to it. left irritation in my roommates and I's throats, every time we smoked it. Tasted like inhaler medicine- as if i could taste the chemicals that were used to grow it.”
“I just got Permafrost as a live resin and I love it!  It's happy and bouncy and a little spicy!”
“awesome strain, my favorite so far. makes me talkative, focused, and is also very uplifting”
“Permafrost was the panacea.  I was in need of an 'attitude adjustment' and Permafrost was there to relieve my chronic symptoms.”
“just a super sweet smell !!”
“the 7th photo is actually northern lights”
“Mixture of my 2 fav strains. Focused happy and pain free.”
“by all rights this is one of my most favorite of all flowers its such a good sativia”
“Each time I try this strain it disappoints, no punch, short duration with little med value. After several different sources I think this one is just not for me.”
“HD g.  ,$d, d”
“I've smoked quite a bit of bud but this is by far my favorite. If you're able to get your hands on this 10/10 strain then do it! You won't regret it!”
“Really good organic nug”
“Grown in cool temps creates this effect (purple).”

“Very interesting smell and taste. Almost spicy. This bud was hyped so I decided I would pick some up on my dispensary run today. I had already got a couple other things so I asked for 2 grams of permafrost without even looking at it because I was in a hurry (Stupid move). The bud was very plain looking. Nothing special at all. Plus it was BONE DRY. It was horrible. The smoke was harsh and the high was barely even fel...”
